messages.title: My Pledges to you
messages.content: I pledge to... Work with local councils to deliver high quality services... Focus on delivering the Local Plan for the future including... Labour’s Sure Start children’s centres.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes for 5, 6, and 7-year-olds funded by ending the Free Schools programme.
More doctors and nurses funded by a mansion tax on homes worth over £2 million.
Promote the Living Wage to ensure low-paid employees can earn enough to provide for their families.
Building more affordable homes to help first time buyers.

mentions.partyLeader: Labour’s plan for a better future
mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s a two horse race here in Newark. The Tory MP has... So only Labour’s Jo Richards can beat the Tory in Newark.

housing.content: Building more affordable homes to help first time buyers.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived locally for 27 years and have raised my family here...

quotes.text: This is a straight fight between Labour and the Tories...
